text: keneku tama paramādhipatigen vū pæhædili sādhakayak labā æti viṭaka, saha (eya tahavuru kirīma vas) tavat sākṣikaruvaku allāhgen pæmiṇi viṭaka, emenma īṭa pera maga penvīmak hā dayāvak vaśayen mūsāgē pustakaya da tibiya dī (eya piṭupānuyē) kumana pudgalayaku da? ovuhu eya viśvāsa karati. tavada jana samūhayan aturin kavareku eya pratikṣēpa karannē da eviṭa ohugē pratignā denu læbū sthānaya (nirā) ginnaya. ebævin num̆ba ē gæna sækayehi pasu novanu. niyata vaśayenma eyayi num̆bagē paramādhipatigen vū satyaya. namut janayā aturin bahutarayak denā eya viśvāsa nokarati
